select UO_OP_MANUAL_HEADER_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into UO_OP_MANUAL_HEADER(head_id, file_name, all_num, valid_num, unvalid_num, status, insert_dt, insert_by, sms_content, push_type, schedule_date) values (#{headId}, #{fileName}, #{allNum}, #{validNum}, #{unvalidNum}, #{status}, #{insertDt}, #{insertBy}, #{smsContent}, #{pushType}, #{scheduleDate})
mapper.select: select PUSH_TYPE, to_char(SCHEDULE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') SCHEDULE_DATE from UO_OP_MANUAL_HEADER where HEAD_ID = #{headId}
select STATUS from UO_OP_MANUAL_HEADER where HEAD_ID = #{headId}
mapper.update: update UO_OP_MANUAL_HEADER set SCHEDULE_DATE = #{scheduleDate} where head_id = #{headId}
update UO_OP_MANUAL_HEADER set STATUS = #{status} where head_id = #{headId}
update uo_op_manual_header c set c.status='3' where trunc(c.SCHEDULE_DATE) >= trunc(sysdate-3) and not exists ( select 1 from uo_op_manual_detail d where d.head_id=c.head_id and d.push_status='P')

update uo_op_manual_header c set (c.success_num,c.faild_num,c.intercept_num)=( select sum(case when d.push_status='S' then 1 else 0) success_num, sum(case when d.push_status='F' then 1 else 0) faild_num, sum(case when d.push_status='C' then 1 else 0) intercept_num, from uo_op_manual_detail d where d.head_id=c.head_id ) where trunc(c.SCHEDULE_DATE) >=trunc(sysdate-3)
update uo_op_manual_header c set c.actual_push_date=( select max(d.push_date) from uo_op_manual_detail d where d.head_id=c.head_id ) where trunc(c.SCHEDULE_DATE) >= trunc(sysdate-3)
